definition: surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy

sentences.english: He marched into southern France, which was then called Gaul.
sentences.chinese: 他进军到当时称为高卢的法国南部。

sentences.english: Caesar subdued Gaul in 50 B. C.
sentences.chinese: 凯撒在公元前五十年时征服高卢。

sentences.english: A dancer’s body combined with winning charm and Gallic grace.
sentences.chinese: 她有舞者的身材，无与伦比的魅力和高卢人的优雅。

sentences.english: France's president held a crisis meeting in response to the defeat of Les Bleus.
sentences.chinese: 法国总统也就高卢雄鸡的失利召开了紧急会议。

sentences.english: Evidence for the Gallican rites of ordination and some other matters is derived from this book.
sentences.chinese: 证据高卢圣仪式的协调和一些其他事项源自这本书。

sentences.english: The Gauls were accustomed to offer human sacrifices, usually criminals.
sentences.chinese: 高卢人习惯于提供人类作为献祭，通过是罪犯。

sentences.english: Gaulish coat of chainmail, of a very fine mesh.
sentences.chinese: 一件锁子甲制的高卢外衣，有很好网眼。

sentences.english: French people generally regarded as Chicken Gauls a symbol of courage.
sentences.chinese: 法国人普遍把高卢鸡视为勇敢的象征。

sentences.english: According to him, it had the measure of a Gaulish pint.
sentences.chinese: 根据他所说，有一个高卢人用的一品脱大的量度器。

sentences.english: Latin did not replace the Celtic language in Britain as it did in Gaul.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁语没有像在高卢那样取代塞尔特语。

sentences.english: Christianity also took root in the second and third centuries AD.
sentences.chinese: 公元前二和三世纪，基督教也在高卢领土扎根下来。

sentences.english: It is the statue of the "Dying Gaul".
sentences.chinese: 这是一尊“垂死挣扎的高卢人”的雕塑。

sentences.english: This is the only known, surviving reference to the goddess Gallia.
sentences.chinese: 这是唯一已知的，幸存的参考女神高卢。

sentences.english: Julius Caesar subdued Gaul in 50 B. C.
sentences.chinese: 凯撒在公元前五十年时征服高卢。

pinyin: Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2
Na4 bu4 le4 si1 wang2 guo2
